item.title: Mercwri Tilt Prom
item.description: mercwri-tilt-prom A solution built on OSS to push readings from a Tilt2 Hydrometer to Prometheus to monitor Homebrew Beer fermentation https://github.com/Mercwri/mercwri-tilt-prom
